评论概述: I have a huge head, but it still works
类型: Color: Gold Frame Grey Polarized Lens
评论详情: The lenses look a little small on my face, but it's good actually because it makes my jaw look bigger.  I get a lot of compliments on these sunglasses. You have to be okay with looking a little eccentric.  Also, sunlight reflects off the inside of the metal flap, blasting into your damn eye. So these are not very practical as far as sunglasses go. Additionally, they are probably not very good at protecting your eyes from UV rays.  That said, they are tremendously stylish and make a statement. People will stop and look at you and wonder what kind of person you are. So be ready.  But if looking like a Mad Max/Dune/Lovecraftian weirdo is your bag, as it is mine, these are essential. And if they get stolen or lost, it's only fifteen bucks.
